title: Global revenue of Puma 2000 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion euros, containing a total of 20 data points.
Overall Revenue in billion euros has increased over the Year.

Revenue in billion euros is rapidly increasing from 2000 to 2006, roughly constant from 2006 to 2009, roughly increasing from 2009 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2016, and finally roughly increasing from 2016 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest Revenue in billion euros, of value 5.5 was reached at Year 2019
Minimum Revenue in billion euros about 0.46 was reached at Year 2000
